## IPackageJsonExports.import property

This export matches when loaded via ESM syntax (i.e. - `import '...'` or `import('...')`<></>). This is always mutually exclusive with [IPackageJsonExports.require](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonexports.require.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
import?: string | IPackageJsonExports;
```
